oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Night-time scene of Backbone Rock, Cherokee National Forest
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Near the Tennessee-Virginia state line." Color tinted and enhanced image of Backbone Rock located in the Cherokee National Forest. Features a white border and divided back. Postcard printed on linen. [No. N-501] [No. E-5620]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Norfolk & Western Railway
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Cherokee National Forest (Tenn.); Shady Valley (Tenn.); Johnson County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forest reserves; Rock formations; Roads
